scripts.start-my: tsc && cp src/config/my.env ./dist/config/.env && env ENVIRONMENT=my nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.start: tsc && cp src/config/.env ./dist/config/.env && env ENVIRONMENT=my nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.start-dev: tsc && cp src/config/dev.env ./dist/config/.env && env ENVIRONMENT=my nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.start-qa: tsc && cp src/config/qa.env ./dist/config/.env && env ENVIRONMENT=my nodemon dist/server.js
scripts.start-uat: tsc && cp src/config/uat.env ./dist/config/.env && env ENVIRONMENT=my nodemon dist/server.js
